dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 3850 IH: Older Americans Act Reauthorization of 2014
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Gibson (for himself, Mr. Reed, and Ms. McCollum) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 2014 through 2018.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Older Americans Act Reauthorization of 2014.

subsection.text: Section 216 of the Older Americans Act of 1965 (42 U.S.C. 3020f) is amended by striking 2007, 2008, 2009, 2010, and 2011 each place it appears and inserting 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018.

subsection.header: Authorization of appropriations for Grants for state and community programs on aging
subsection.text: The Older Americans Act of 1965 (42 U.S.C. 3023)—

subparagraph.text: in subsections (a), (b), and (d) by striking 2007, 2008, 2009, 2010, and 2011 each place it appears and inserting 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018, and

clause.text: in paragraph (2) by striking $166,500,000 and all that follows through 2011, and inserting $187,000,000 for each of the fiscal years 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018, and
by redesignating paragraphs (2) and (3) as paragraphs (1) and (2), respectively, and

paragraph.text: in section 373(f)(1)(A) is amended by striking 2007, 2008, 2009, 2010, and 2011 and inserting 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018.

subsection.header: Authorization of appropriations for educational activities
subsection.text: Section 411(b) of the Older Americans Act of 1965 (42 U.S.C. 3032(b)) is amended by striking 2007, 2008, 2009, 2010, and 2011 and inserting 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018.

subsection.header: Authorization of appropriations for community service employment
subsection.text: Section 517(a) of the Older Americans Act of 1965 (42 U.S.C. 3056o) is amended by striking 2007, 2008, 2009, 2010, and 2011 and inserting 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018.

subsection.header: Authorization of appropriations for grants for Native Americans
subsection.text: Section 643 of the Older Americans Act of 1965 (42 U.S.C. 3057n) is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (1) by striking 2007 and inserting 2014, and
by amending paragraph (2) to read as follows:
for part C, $7,900,000 for each of the fiscal years 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018.
